timeSeriesQuery.timeSeriesQueryLanguage:
fetch logging.googleapis.com/user/sniffer_heartbeat_count
| filter (resource.type == 'gce_instance' || resource.type == 'k8s_container' || resource.type == 'global')
| group_by [metric.label.sniffer_id, metric.label.interface],
    {aggregation_function: rate(sum(value.sniffer_heartbeat_count))}
| every 1m
| within 5m

fetch logging.googleapis.com/user/pcap_files_uploaded_count
| filter (resource.type == 'gce_instance' || resource.type == 'k8s_container' || resource.type == 'global')
| group_by [metric.label.sniffer_id],
    {aggregation_function: rate(sum(value.pcap_files_uploaded_count))}
| every 1m
| within 5m

fetch cloud_run_revision
| metric 'run.googleapis.com/request_count'
| filter (resource.service_name == '${cloud_run_processor_service_name}' && metric.response_code_class == '2xx')
| group_by [], {aggregation_function: rate(sum(value.request_count))}
| every 1m
| within 5m

fetch pubsub_subscription
| metric 'pubsub.googleapis.com/subscription/num_unacked_messages_by_region'
| filter resource.subscription_id == '${pubsub_processor_subscription_id}'
| group_by [], {aggregation_function: max(value.num_unacked_messages_by_region)}
| every 1m
| within 5m

fetch cloud_run_revision
| metric 'logging.googleapis.com/user/udm_events_generated_count'
| group_by [], {aggregation_function: rate(sum(value.udm_events_generated_count))}
| every 1m
| within 5m

fetch logging.googleapis.com/user/pcap_upload_errors_count
| filter (resource.type == 'gce_instance' || resource.type == 'k8s_container' || resource.type == 'global')
| group_by [metric.label.sniffer_id],
    {aggregation_function: sum(value.pcap_upload_errors_count)}
| every 1m
| within 5m
